game.name: Kerbal Space Program
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In Kerbal Space Program, take charge of the space program for the alien race known as the Kerbals. You have access to an array of parts to assemble fully-functional spacecraft that flies (or doesn’t) based on realistic aerodynamic and orbital physics.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In Kerbal Space Program, take charge of the space program for the alien race known as the Kerbals. You have access to an array of parts to assemble fully-functional spacecraft that flies (or doesn’t) based on realistic aerodynamic and orbital physics.

reviewHighlights.text: rtx 4060으로 프레임 1 나올때까지 모드를 깔아야 이쁜게임
장점 : 현실적인 물리엔진 단점 : 현실적인 물리엔진
